ygData.subject: Re: OT - Video cards, was:Equipment question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the ... Ok, I ll try this. One more question though. How do I access my inventory when in full screen mode? I normally do play in full screen, but when
ygData.messageBody:
--- In eqbards@y..., Henrik Holm <HEH@z...> wrote:
> Try hitting <F10> ingame. The little area is only when youre using
the
> "boxed" mode..
>
> Musiker
>

Ok, I'll try this. One more question though. How do I access my
inventory when in full screen mode? I normally do play in full
screen, but when ever I hit "I" it goes back to windowed mode... I
need to figure this out first or it will suck to play in another
video mode. What about the spellbook screen? Isn't this a hassle too
if the windowed veiw is really tiny?? Please help =)

Kinrea Keres
45th DE warrior

Lereny
13th Half Elf Bard
